abstract: The database that the operation uses.
overview:
## Discussion

For operations that you execute in a custom queue, use this property to specify the target database. Setting the database also sets the corresponding container, which it inherits from [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation]. If this property’s value is `nil`, the operation targets the user’s private database.

The default value is `nil`.

# database

**Instance Property**

The database that the operation uses.

## Declaration

```swift
var database: CKDatabase? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For operations that you execute in a custom queue, use this property to specify the target database. Setting the database also sets the corresponding container, which it inherits from [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation]. If this property’s value is `nil`, the operation targets the user’s private database.

The default value is `nil`.
title: database
